verbs.description: [ARG1: Trump] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: in Israel] [ARGM-PRP: to see the realization of his campaign promise that they would relocate the embassy from Tel Aviv and recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel] .
[ARG0: Trump] was not in Israel to [V: see] [ARG1: the realization of his campaign promise that they would relocate the embassy from Tel Aviv and recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel] .

Trump was not in Israel to see the realization of his campaign promise that [ARG0: they] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: relocate] [ARG1: the embassy] [ARG2: from Tel Aviv] and recognize Jerusalem as the capital of Israel .

Trump was not in Israel to see the realization of his campaign promise that [ARG0: they] [ARGM-MOD: would] relocate the embassy from Tel Aviv and [V: recognize] [ARG1: Jerusalem] [ARG2: as the capital of Israel] .
